msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'sax-2_0_1'.

author: zongaro
msg: Build and packaging changes from Sarah McNamara (mcnamara@ca.ibm.com).
Changed product name and version information so that they will be specified by
build.xml, rather than being hard-coded here.

author: zongaro
msg: Build and packaging changes from Sarah McNamara (mcnamara@ca.ibm.com).
Source for META-INF/MANIFEST.MF should pick up implementation version and
vendor and Java version and vendor from values specified in build.xml, rather
than hard-coding.  Also, updated SAX and JAXP specification versions.

author: zongaro
msg: Build and packaging changes from Sarah McNamara (mcnamara@ca.ibm.com).
Create a binary distribution of xml-commons containing xml-apis.jar and
javadocs.  The base name of the zip/tar.gz files for the binary distribution is
xml-commons-external.  Also, removed historical renaming of sources tar file

author: zongaro
msg: Public keys for a few Xerces and Xalan subproject committers.  Contributed by Sarah McNamara (mcnamara@ca.ibm.com)
